product_name: Timbuk2 Copilot Rolling Luggage - X-Large - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With an external expandable handle and a handy clamshell opening, the X-Large Timbuk2 Copilot Roller gives you lots of room to pack as impractically as you'd like. Bike-inspired grip and removable skateboard wheels make the X-Large Timbuk2 Copilot comfortable and easy to roll around. Wide clamshell opening ensures easy packing; features a separate storage compartment for shoes, wet clothes or cosmetics. Multiple exterior pockets offer lots of places to stash travel items. Exterior is built to last with rugged ballistic nylon and heavy-duty stitching; multiple grab straps ease handling. Closeout.
short_description: With an external expandable handle and a handy clamshell opening, the X-Large Timbuk2 Copilot Roller gives you lots of room to pack as impractically as you'd like.
